Title: Full Disclosure
Writer: Roger Drew (teleplay), Ian Martin (teleplay), Roger Drew (story), Armando Iannucci (story), Ian Martin (story), Armando Iannucci (creator)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: With the Veep and her staff taking flack over a pregnancy rumor and the firing of a Secret Service agent, Selina orders a 'partial' full disclosure of all office correspondence and threatens to fire a key staffer.
